verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Vumilia roho yangu,
majaribu ni kama moto,
yanayochoma imani yangu,
Bwana naomba unisaidie.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Siku za Bwana ni nyakati hizi,
wenye imani wameshakuwa
imani yao ijaribiwe,
Bwana naomba unisaidie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shetani naye amekazana,
kuharibu waliojenga
lakini Bwana ninakuomba,
Bwana naomba unisaidie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nataka kwako, shetani hapana,
ndani yangu niwe salama
Yesu nifiche nisionekane,
Bwana naomba unisaidie.
